## Library

## PARAMETERS

```{r }

# foret = 3, savanna = 4, pasture = 15, soybean = 39, other temp.crops = 41, per.crops = 36

time_laps <- c(1985:2019)
year=2019
y <- which(time_laps==year)
lu.code = 3
lu.name = "forest"
tampon=100


```

## LOADING & MERGING files


```{r }

# basins
hydrobasin <- st_read(file.path(dir_data, "hydroshed", "subbas_3bas.shp"))

# landscape metrics
list_rv <- list()

for (i in 1:2031){

    WD.tmp = list.files(path=dir_data, pattern = paste0("Basin_",i,"_"), full.names = TRUE)

    basin.name <- hydrobasin[i,]$basin
    
    list_rv[[i]] <- get(load(file=file.path(WD.tmp, paste0("mapbiomas_lsm_buf",tampon, "_",i,".RData")))) 
    
    if(list_rv[[i]]=="nonascente"){
    list_rv[[i]] <- NA}

    else {list_rv[[i]] <- list_rv[[i]] %>% filter(layer==y) %>% mutate(basin=basin.name) }

}

# merging all
df_lsm_rv <- do.call("rbind",list_rv) %>% dplyr::select(metric, class, basin, ID, value) %>% filter(metric=='pland', class == lu.code) %>% drop_na()

dim(df_lsm_rv)

```

## Statistical tests

```{r }

df_xingu <- df_lsm_rv %>% filter(basin=='xingu') %>% dplyr::select(value)
df_juru <- df_lsm_rv %>% filter(basin=='juruenc') %>% dplyr::select(value)
df_teles <- df_lsm_rv %>% filter(basin=='teles') %>% dplyr::select(value)


# 1. Normality

shapiro.test(unlist(df_xingu))
shapiro.test(unlist(df_juru))
shapiro.test(unlist(df_teles))




```

## BOXPLOTTING

We compute boxplots of % of lost forest, for the two main agriculture types: pasture or crops

```{r }


ggplot(df_lsm_rv) + 
  geom_boxplot(aes(x=factor(basin),y=value, group=basin, fill=factor(basin)), show.legend = FALSE, alpha=0.2) +
  #coord_cartesian(ylim = quantile(df_lsm_rv$value, c(0, 0.9)))+
  labs(title = paste0(" % ", lu.name," per sub-basin riparian area (",tampon,"m) in ", year), x="", y="")+ 
  theme_bw()+
  theme(axis.text.x = element_text(size = 12), axis.title.x = element_text(size = 10, vjust = 1.5, hjust=1),
        axis.text.y = element_text(size = 12), axis.title.y = element_text(size = 10, angle = 0, vjust=1.05),
        plot.title = element_text(size = 10, face = "bold", hjust=0.5))


ggsave(file.path(dir_plot, paste0(year, lu.name,tampon,"_rv_basin.boxplot.pdf")), dpi = 300)

```
